explanation: Agent A is correct. MISRA C 2023 Rule 17.8 states that a function parameter shall not be modified; the object referred to by a pointer parameter may be modified but the pointer itself shall not be modified. In OS_Posix_InternalTaskCreate_Impl the parameter stacksz (type size_t, passed by value) is assigned to multiple times (e.g. "stacksz = PTHREAD_STACK_MIN;", "stacksz += POSIX_GlobalVars.PageSize - 1;", and "stacksz -= stacksz % POSIX_GlobalVars.PageSize;"). These statements modify the value parameter and therefore violate Rule 17.8. The suggested remediation — copy the incoming parameter to a local variable and perform arithmetic on that local variable, then use that local when calling pthread_attr_setstacksize — is appropriate.
